comments.html: We were close but many were trained on the classical core, distribution and access model and based on OS offerings at the time. I had some clients back then where we did do all L3 with the core acting as a core/dist(spine) and the access(for WS an Servers) just as leafs(tors) all L3 and with the 2 switch approach too.  But many of the training guides/texts etc still had the 3 tier hierarchy outline.
